title: Crossbowman Statue

properties.name: description
properties.value: Crossbowman Statues can be found on all floors of the Hallowed Sepulchre. The player must avoid the bolts they fire from their crossbow in order to proceed through the sepulchre. There are three different types of crossbowman statues. The grey ones are found on floors 1 and 2, and fire bolts that fly at the same speed as the player can run. The gold ones are found on floor 3 and the upper level of floor 4, and fire bolts fly 50% faster than the player can run. The blue ones are found on the lower level of floor 4 and on floor 5, and fire bolts that fly twice as fast as the player can run.

Crossbowman Statues can be found on all floors of the Hallowed Sepulchre. The player must avoid the bolts they fire from their crossbow in order to proceed through the sepulchre. There are three different types of crossbowman statues. The grey ones are found on floors 1 and 2, and fire bolts that fly at the same speed as the player can run. The gold ones are found on floor 3 and the upper level of floor 4, and fire bolts fly 50% faster than the player can run. The blue ones are found on the lower level of floor 4 and on floor 5, and fire bolts that fly twice as fast as the player can run.

'''Crossbowman Statues''' can be found on all floors of the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]. The player must avoid the bolts they fire from their crossbow in order to proceed through the sepulchre. There are three different types of crossbowman statues. The grey ones are found on floors 1 and 2, and fire bolts that fly at the same speed as the player can run. The gold ones are found on floor 3 and the upper level of floor 4, and fire bolts fly 50% faster than the player can run. The blue ones are found on the lower level of floor 4 and on floor 5, and fire bolts that fly twice as fast as the player can run.
